components.name: Locking
components.description: Issues related to the Locking system

fields.summary: Oracle backed DbLockManager fail when drop/truncate acid table with large partitions

comments.body: The issue is introduced by HIVE-20080. TxnUtils.buildQueryWithINClause could return multiple queries.
Patch for branch-2 attached. On branch-3/master, HIVE-20080's clone HIVE-20518 is not committed. We need to bring HIVE-20518 to branch-3/master, then apply this patch.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12948272/HIVE-20921.branch-2.1.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to build exiting with an error
